page.title: 10Trade. B&Q DIY Superstore.
page.content: This is a big DIY Supermarket that was opened in 1984. There are 60 B&Q supermarkets open. The biggest will be open in Doncaster. It has a paint mixer and a large kitchen centre with wall units. In the garden centre there are many plants and a pond. There is a loud alarm on the fence. The most popular flowers are roses. There is a green house. They have a lot of representatives and they can only order what they can fit on their shelves. The most popular items sold are grow bags. The workers have 2-3 weeks holidays a year.
